import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import Chart from "chart.js/auto"; import { collection, onSnapshot } from "firebase/firestore"; import { db } from "../firebase"; const Dashboard = () => { useEffect(() => { const ctxLine = document.getElementById("myAreaChart"); const ctxPie = document.getElementById("myPieChart"); const [lineData, setLineData] = useState([]); const [labels, setLabels] = useState([]); // Line Chart if (ctxLine) { new Chart(ctxLine, { type: "line", data: { labels: ["Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun"], datasets: [ { label: "Earnings", data: [0, 1000, 5000, 3000, 7000, 4000], borderColor: "#4e73df", backgroundColor: "rgba(78, 115, 223, 0.05)", fill: true, tension: 0.4, }, ], }, options: { responsive: true, maintainAspectRatio: false, //this will take up the full width of the parent container plugins: { legend: { display: false }, }, scales: { y: { beginAtZero: true }, }, }, }); } // Pie Chart if (ctxPie) { new Chart(ctxPie, { type: "doughnut", data: { labels: ["Direct", "Social", "Referral"], datasets: [ { data: [55, 30, 15], backgroundColor: ["#4e73df", "#1cc88a", "#36b9cc"], hoverBackgroundColor: ["#2e59d9", "#17a673", "#2c9faf"], hoverBorderColor: "rgba(234, 236, 244, 1)", }, ], }, options: { maintainAspectRatio: false, plugins: { legend: { position: "bottom" }, }, cutout: "75%", }, }); } // Cleanup on unmount return () => { if (lineChartInstance) lineChartInstance.destroy(); if (pieChartInstance) pieChartInstance.destroy(); }; }, []); return (
{/* */}
